metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1972 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: A potential heap based buffer overflow was found in _bfd_elf_slurp_version_tables() in bfd/elf.c. This may lead to loss of availability.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> binutils isn't safe for untrusted inputs. mdeslaur> buffer over-read, likely just a crash when parsing a corrupted file, setting priority to low

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
gdb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
